page.title: 08CLUBS IN WILLINGDON
page.content: There are many clubs in the Willingdon area to which children may belong. These exist both in schools and in the community. At school children have a wide choice of sporting activities as well as Art and Drama. Outside school they may join various organisations such as Cubs, Brownies, Guides and Scouts as well as such clubs as St. John's Ambulance, Red Cross, Majorettes and Youth Clubs. Many local children belong to Polegate Junior Disco which is held every month on Saturday for a cost of 50p per session. A large number of children attend music clubs or have lessons. They learn to play the recorder at school and some learn the guitar and piano and belong to a singing club.
